Class ClosingReportAsciiDoc

java.lang.Object
net.tangly.erp.ledger.artifacts.ClosingReportAsciiDoc
public class ClosingReportAsciiDoc extends Object
A complete accounting report for a specific time interval. We suggest you use year, half-year, and quarter ports. The output format is AsciiDoc.

  • Constructor Details

    • ClosingReportAsciiDoc

      public ClosingReportAsciiDoc(LedgerRealm realm, net.tangly.core.TypeRegistry registry)
      Constructor of the closing report. Multiple ports with variable reporting period length can be generated with the same instance.
      Parameters:
      realm - ledger realm containing all the accounting information for the ports
      registry - registry containing the VAT codes

  • Method Details

    • create

      public void create(LocalDate from, LocalDate to, PrintWriter writer, boolean withBalanceSheet, boolean withProfitsAndLosses, boolean withEmptyAccounts, boolean withTransactions, boolean withVat)
      Creates the accounting report for the specified period. The report can contain the balance sheet, the profit and loss statement, the VAT report and the
      Parameters:
      from - start date of the report
      to - end date of the report
      writer - writer to write the report
      withBalanceSheet - flag to include the balance sheet in the report
      withProfitsAndLosses - flag to include the profit and loss statement in the report
      withTransactions - flag to include the transactions in the report
      withVat - flag to include the VAT report in the report
